str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
From philos and hippos; fond of horses; Philippus, the name of four Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
A chariot, vehicle. Probably from airo (as a particle of union) prefixed); a chariot (compare harmos).

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From kolla; to glue, i.e. to stick.
